document.discussion_title: John Kline Honors Minnesotans as ‘Stars of the North’ for Random Acts of Kindness (John Kline)
document.topic_text: ( Source : John Kline ) " I continue to be amazed by the countless Minnesotans who selflessly go above and beyond in their service to their communities, " said Kline. "These ' Star of the North ' honorees graciously and generously give their
